**Step 2:** Approval and selection of the candidate will be done by the senior-most officer of the labour office or the competent authority appointed by the secretary after the application has been examined. 
**Step 3:** Time period for submission of application - Application can be submitted within a period of 6 months from the date of completion of International Sports Competition/Tournament. 
**Step 4:** The incentive amount will be transferred through electronic means (RTGS / NEFT) to the candidate&#39;s bank account under the central banking system.

ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "For this scheme, those construction workers will be eligible, who are registered as labour under labour law. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Those building and other construction workers will be eligible who are registered as beneficiaries in the board under Section-12 of The Building and Other Construction Workers (Regulation of Employment and Conditions of Service) Act, 1996 and are depositing their contribution regularly. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "In addition to the above, unmarried sons and daughters of construction workers will also be eligible for assistance under the scheme.
